name: Spear Master
description:
For centuries, brave warriors called 'Spear Masters' have protected the world. You are the son of a legendary hero, it is now your turn to follow in the footsteps of your 'Inuit' ancestors and save the world from an ancient evil.

Spear Master is a fast-paced action game where you throw spears at bouncing balls in order to split them. Destroy enemies, defeat all bosses and save the world from the terrible Tar balls!

What to expect?

  • Explore 5 islands filled with levels
  • Battle ferocious enemies and bosses
  • Meet interesting characters
  • Solve ancient puzzles
  • Unlock powerful new abilities
  • Buy items (no in-app purchases)
  • Keyboard + mouse, and controller support
